title: Bone Marrow Aspiration
description: Bone marrow aspiration, direct removal of a small amount (about 1â€“5 millilitres) of bone marrow by suction through a hollow needle.

title: Glucose Test
description: Glucose test, procedure to assess the ability of the body to metabolize glucose, the principal type of sugar found in the blood.

title: Immunologic Blood Test
description: Immunologic blood test, any of a group of diagnostic analyses of blood that employ antigens (foreign proteins) and antibodies.
